DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether grapefruit juice alters the metabolism of cortisol following intense exercise.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Fruit Juices on Hormone Metabolism
DOC.criteria: Young men and women, not taking medications known to alter glucocorticoid metabolism Diabetes, uncontrolled hypertension, obesity, any medication known to interact with grapefruit juice
